refined wheat flour.reason: Low in fiber and nutrients; spikes blood sugar.
refined wheat flour.after_effects: May contribute to weight gain, blood sugar issues, digestive problems when overconsumed.

refined palm oil.reason: High in saturated fats which may raise cholesterol.
refined palm oil.after_effects: Excessive intake may increase risk of heart disease.

sugar.reason: Increases risk of obesity, diabetes, and cavities.
sugar.after_effects: Energy spikes then crashes; weight gain if overconsumed.

invert sugar syrup.reason: Fast-absorbing sugar form; increases blood sugar quickly.
invert sugar syrup.after_effects: May contribute to weight gain and energy crashes.

cashew nuts.reason: Good source of healthy fats, protein, vitamins and minerals.
cashew nuts.after_effects: Supports energy, heart and brain health when eaten in moderation.

milk solids.reason: Source of protein and calcium; may be difficult for lactose-intolerant people.
milk solids.after_effects: Supports bone health; may cause bloating for some.

butter.reason: Contains fat-soluble vitamins but is high in saturated fat.
butter.after_effects: In moderation aids nutrient absorption; excess may raise cholesterol.

raising agents.reason: Used to make baked goods rise; safe in regulated amounts.
raising agents.after_effects: No significant effects at normal use levels.

iodised salt.reason: Provides iodine to support thyroid; excess sodium is harmful.
iodised salt.after_effects: Prevents iodine deficiency; excessive intake may cause hypertension.

emulsifier.reason: Helps oil/water mix; safe in small quantities.
emulsifier.after_effects: Generally safe; some emulsifiers can affect gut microbiome if overconsumed.

flavouring substances.reason: Artificial or nature-identical flavors add taste but no nutrition.
flavouring substances.after_effects: Some people may have sensitivities or allergic responses.

hydrogenated oils.reason: Can contain trans fats which are harmful for heart health.
hydrogenated oils.after_effects: Raise bad cholesterol (LDL), increase heart disease risk.

almonds.reason: Rich in vitamin E, magnesium and healthy fats.
almonds.after_effects: Supports heart and brain health; satiating.

honey.reason: Natural sweetener with antioxidants but still sugar.
honey.after_effects: Can spike blood sugar if overused.

artificial colors.reason: Some synthetic dyes linked to sensitivity/hyperactivity in children.
artificial colors.after_effects: May cause allergic reactions for some people.
